description: IngressBackend describes all endpoints for a given service and port.

serviceName.description: Specifies the name of the referenced service.

servicePort.description: IntOrString is a type that can hold an int32 or a string.  When used in JSON or YAML marshalling and unmarshalling, it produces or consumes the inner type.  This allows you to have, for example, a JSON field that can accept a name or number.
